text:
SVT | Data engineer | Stockholm, Sweden | Onsite | Full-time | https://svt.se / https://svtplay.se

Sveriges Television (SVT) is Sweden's national public service broadcaster. Our aim is to create and provide content that engages, entertains and enriches â€“ all in the service of the public.

We produce a lot of our own content and develop applications for news and entertainment. Recently we started building our own analytics platform to help us make more informed strategic and operative decisions and make SVT more data-driven going forwards.

Tech stack: Go, Scala, GCP

For more information and how to apply: https://blogg.svt.se/svti/next-data-engineer-team/
